metadata.synopsis: Reaction AD to any other guard or Tusgront being killed - mostly to cover edge cases so players know that they'll be attacked on sight. (Only one will play, but all the guards need them incase the player wipes anywhere from 1 to all-bar-one out) - This guard is repeatedly failing to cast a spell normally, so figured I'd give him a bit of flavour.

0.speaker: Sparks Musgravel
0.text: Right. Can't say you weren't warned!
0.context: NodeContext: Finally losing patience - about to start combat.

1.speaker: Sparks Musgravel
1.text: Whoever's skulking - if you make me lose another damn spell, I'll club you instead. Aye?
1.context: NodeContext: Our sneaking is distracting this guard from spell practice - he is not pleased
